browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/31.0.1650.63 Safari/537.36

visible_files.makefile:
run.tests.output : makefile run.tests
	./run.tests

run.tests : makefile *.cpp *.hpp
	g++ -std=c++11 -Wall -Werror -O *.cpp -o run.tests
visible_files.instructions:
Your task is to create an LCD string representation of an
integer value using a 3x3 grid of space, underscore, and 
pipe characters for each digit. Each digit is shown below 
(using a dot instead of a space)

._.   ...   ._.   ._.   ...   ._.   ._.   ._.   ._.   ._.
|.|   ..|   ._|   ._|   |_|   |_.   |_.   ..|   |_|   |_|
|_|   ..|   |_.   ._|   ..|   ._|   |_|   ..|   |_|   ..|


Example: 910

._. ... ._.
|_| ..| |.|
..| ..| |_|
